title: 6.21 Patching
body: Can someone please help me patch my game. I havn't been able to play since the patch came out and I have tried everything it says "Unspecified Error" this happens at 2/2 33%. Someone please help.

replies.body:
Issues after 32% during patching are usually caused by your patcher being unable to establish a solid connection to our patching servers. Make sure your network settings align with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure the best connection possible.

Let me know if those steps helped.
